emv_display.h File Reference

Methods to display EMV data on the GUI. More...

#include "ams_types.h"

 Display a C string on the GUI.
void emvDisplayByteArray (const u8 *array, size_t length)
 Display an array of byte values.
void emvDisplayUid (const u8 *uid, size_t length)
 Display a card UID (or PUPI) on the GUI.
void emvDisplayError (s16 errorCode)
 Display an EMV error code converted to readable text on the GUI.
void emvDisplayMessage (s16 messageCode)
 Display a standardized EMV Message on the GUI.
void emvDisplayCAPDU (const u8 *apdu, size_t length)
 Display a command APDU on the GUI.
void emvDisplayRAPDU (const u8 *apdu, size_t length)
 Display a response APDU on the GUI.

void emvDisplayUid ( const u8 *  uid,
size_t  length 
)

Card UIDs are displayed as byte arrays with the most significant byte first.
